flounder.fonts

Class Word

  • java.lang.Object
    • flounder.fonts.Word

  • public class Word
extends java.lang.Object
    During the loading of a text this represents one word in the text.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Modifier Constructor and Description
      protected Word(double fontSize)
      Create a new empty word.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      protected void addCharacter(Character character)
      Adds a character to the end of the current word and increases the screen-space width of the word.
      protected java.util.List<Character> getCharacters() 
      protected double getWordWidth() 

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • Word

        protected Word(double fontSize)
        Create a new empty word.
        Parameters:
        fontSize - The font size of the text which this word is in.

    • Method Detail

      • addCharacter

        protected void addCharacter(Character character)
        Adds a character to the end of the current word and increases the screen-space width of the word.
        Parameters:
        character - The character to be added.

      • getCharacters

        protected java.util.List<Character> getCharacters()
        Returns:
        The list of characters in the word.

      • getWordWidth

        protected double getWordWidth()
        Returns:
        The width of the word in terms of screen size.
